mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.sushe_id as susheId ,a.suguan_id as suguanId ,a.fangke_name as fangkeName ,a.fangke_phone as fangkePhone ,a.fangke_id_number as fangkeIdNumber ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.fangke_photo as fangkePhoto ,a.fangke_content as fangkeContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,sushe.sushe_number_uuid as susheNumberUuid ,sushe.louyu_types as louyuTypes ,sushe.sushe_name as susheName ,sushe.sushe_louceng as susheLouceng ,sushe.sushe_address as susheAddress ,sushe.kezhu_number as kezhuNumber ,sushe.yizhu_number as yizhuNumber ,suguan.suguan_name as suguanName ,suguan.suguan_phone as suguanPhone ,suguan.suguan_photo as suguanPhoto ,suguan.suguan_email as suguanEmail
FROM fangke a left JOIN sushe sushe ON a.sushe_id = sushe.id left JOIN suguan suguan ON a.suguan_id = suguan.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.sushe_id = #{params.susheId} )
and ( a.suguan_id = #{params.suguanId} )
and a.fangke_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangkeName},'%')
and a.fangke_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangkePhone},'%')
and a.fangke_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangkeIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.fangke_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangkeContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.sushe_id IS NOT NULL
and sushe.sushe_number_uuid like CONCAT('%',#{params.susheNumberUuid},'%')
and sushe.louyu_types = #{params.louyuTypes}
and sushe.sushe_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.susheName},'%')
and sushe.sushe_louceng like CONCAT('%',#{params.susheLouceng},'%')
and sushe.sushe_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.susheAddress},'%')
and sushe.kezhu_number >= #{params.kezhuNumberStart}
and sushe.kezhu_number <= #{params.kezhuNumberEnd}
and sushe.kezhu_number = #{params.kezhuNumber}
and sushe.yizhu_number >= #{params.yizhuNumberStart}
and sushe.yizhu_number <= #{params.yizhuNumberEnd}
and sushe.yizhu_number = #{params.yizhuNumber}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(sushe.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(sushe.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.suguan_id IS NOT NULL
and suguan.suguan_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.suguanName},'%')
and suguan.suguan_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.suguanPhone},'%')
and suguan.suguan_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.suguanEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
